docs.lead_paragraph: When a brief reference was made in this collumn a week or so ago to the "guileless Mr. Boody," and when it was pointed out that the Mayor's assertion that he didn't know what the Long Island Water-Supply Company wanted to do with its plant and was ignorant as to whether the politicians favored his condemnation bill or not was almost beyond belief, Mayor Boody was very angry.

headline.main: BOODY BELIES HIS PROTEST; STILL HELPING LONG ISLAND WATER COMPANY TO A GOOD SALE. USELESS HYDRANTS AUTHORIZED TO ADD TO ITS REVENUE -- UNTRUE TO HIS SUPPORTERS -- HAYDEN WILL NOW ATTEND TO BOTH HIS OFFICES.

docs.abstract: Ward Boundaries Changed; Political Reasons; Action of Legislature and Aldermen
